articles.author: Vivian Ho
articles.title: Police officer who Tasered 95-year-old woman found guilty of manslaughter - The Washington Post
articles.description: Australian police officer Kristian White used his Taser on Clare Nowland at her nursing home, in an incident that led to calls for an inquiry into police use of force.
articles.content: An Australian police officer was found guilty of manslaughter on Wednesday for deploying a Taser on a 95-year-old woman with dementia while responding to reports at her nursing home that she was arme… [+3141 chars]

articles.author: ROD MCGUIRK Associated Press
articles.title: Australia's social media ban for kids is closer to becoming law - ABC News
articles.description: Australia’s House of Representatives has passed a bill that would ban children younger than 16 years from social media
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia -- Australias House of Representatives on Wednesday passed a bill that would ban children younger than 16 years old from social media, leaving it to the Senate to finalize the wo… [+3404 chars]
